page.title: 07CLUBS CONTINUED
page.content: CRICKET CLUB We now have a cricket club. They meet on Sundays. They have eleven players in each team. They play on the playing field. YOUTH CLUB We have a youth club. They meet on Wednesday evenings in the village hall. The children are aged thirteen onwards. They play table tennis and other things like that. DRAMA CLUB You can be any age to go to the drama club. They perform a special Christmas show with a script that has been specially written. They do musical evenings and other activites to entertain other groups in the area.
